page.title: 03LEE-ON-SOLENT JUNIOR SCHOOL.
page.content: At{8.45}I enter school.I am among the first people to arrive.I sit down at my place and change my shoes.From my drawer I get out the books I will need.At{8.55}everyone is here,Mrs. Fane calls the register and does the dinner numbers,whilst we read our books.Later some groups do{Maths}while others do{Language}work.After assembly the groups swap over until lunch-time. Our hall is not big enough to seat all the children for lunch at the same time.Years 1 and 4 and 3 and 2 alternate to be 1st. and 2nd.sittings. We have two head-servers to each table.Head-servers keep the children on their table quiet.After lunch we do {Art,Games,History,Science,Geography and{Nature}depending on the day. We have three playtimes during the day.The one in the morning is from 10.20 to 10.40.
